original_text:
You shall know that your tent is at peace,
    and you shall inspect your fold and miss nothing.
korean_text: 네가 네 장막의 평안함을 알고 네 우리를 살펴도 잃은 것이 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: that your tent is at peace
and you shall inspect your fold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 네 우리를 살피게 될 것이다
